meta.name: description
meta.content: Lorena Independent School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in Lorena, TX.

div.div: Please visit this page for all the latest information related to our suspension of normal district operations due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
Do you know someone who will be enrolling a Pre-K or Kindergarten student in LISD for the 2020-2021 school year? If so, please share this information with them about our online pre-enrollment.
Please visit our Instructional Support Page to find out how your student can access academic resources and activities through the end of the school year.
Beginning March 23, Lorena ISD will provide Mobile Food Delivery for Free and Reduced eligible students on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays during the closure period. Click above for details.
The LISD Board of Trustees has adopted the calendar for the 2020-21 school year.
Lorena ISD will have Spring Break March 9-13. School will resume March 16th. Enjoy the time off Leopard Nation!
Lorena Primary School is celebrating Read Across America Week March 2-6 with special reading activities, guest readers in classrooms, and LOTS of fun!
March 2-6 is School Breakfast Week! Thank you to our dedicated Food Service workers!

div.div: Lorena ISD will educate the "whole child" in partnership with parents and community members.
